mainEntity.name: How is autonomous hiring different from an ATS?

acceptedAnswer.text: Autonomous hiring platforms like shortlistd execute recruitment tasks such as sourcing, screening, interviewing, and shortlisting. ATS platforms primarily track applicants and manage workflows without performing hiring work.

mainEntity.name: How does shortlistd compare to recruitment agencies?

acceptedAnswer.text: shortlistd replaces manual recruiter workflows with AI agents that operate in parallel, reduce cost, and deliver faster, more consistent outcomes than traditional recruitment agencies.
